questions_spa: ¿Cuál fue el último libro que leíste?

questions_eng: Do you prefer physical books or e-books?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es el libro más largo que has leído?
questions_eng: What is the longest book you have read?

questions_spa: ¿Qué géneros de literatura te gusta leer?
questions_eng: What genres of literature do you like to read?

questions_spa: ¿Qué tan rápido lees?
questions_eng: How fast do you read?

questions_eng: How often do you go to the library?

questions_spa: ¿Qué libro te ha impactado más?
questions_eng: Which book has had the biggest impact on you?

questions_spa: ¿Prefieres libros de ficción o de no ficción?
questions_eng: Do you prefer fiction or non-fiction books?

questions_spa: ¿Qué libro ha cambiado una de tus antiguas opiniones?
questions_eng: Which book has changed one of your old opinions?

questions_eng: Which book has had the greatest effect on the modern world?

questions_eng: What was the worst book you had to read for school? And how about the best book you had to read for school?

questions_spa: ¿Crees que las personas leen más o menos libros ahora que hace 50 años?
questions_eng: Do you think people read more or fewer books now than they did 50 years ago?

questions_eng: Now that independent publishing has become easier, have books gotten better or worse?

questions_spa: Dicen que todo el mundo tiene un libro dentro de sí. ¿De qué trataría tu libro?
questions_eng: They say everyone has a book in them. What would your book be about?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál fue el mejor libro o serie de libros que has leído?
questions_eng: What was the best book or series of books you've read?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es tu cocina preferida o tipo de comida favorita?
questions_eng: What is your favourite cuisine or favourite type of food?

questions_spa: ¿Qué alimentos odias absolutamente?
questions_eng: What foods do you absolutely hate?

questions_spa: ¿Qué piensas de los bufés?
questions_eng: What do you think of buffets?

questions_spa: ¿Qué comida se ve asquerosa pero sabe delicioso?
questions_eng: What food looks disgusting but tastes delicious?

questions_eng: What do you buy every time you go to the supermarket?

questions_eng: If your life were a meal, what kind of meal would it be?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál querrías que fuera tu última comida si estuvieras en el corredor de la muerte?

questions_eng: What food do you know you shouldn't eat but can't stop yourself?

questions_eng: Do you like spicy food, why or why not, what is the spiciest thing you have ever eaten?

questions_spa: ¿Tiene el gobierno un lugar en la regulación de los alimentos? ¿En qué medida debe el gobierno regular los alimentos?
questions_eng: Does the government have a place in regulating food? To what extent should the government regulate food?

questions_spa: Cuando la gente comete errores sobre la comida (especialmente la comida extranjera), ¿sientes la necesidad de corregirlos?
questions_eng: When people make mistakes about food (especially foreign food), do you feel the need to correct them?

questions_eng: Which restaurant do you eat at most often?

questions_eng: What is the worst restaurant you have ever eaten in?

questions_eng: If you opened a restaurant, what kind of food would you serve?

questions_eng: What is the strangest themed restaurant you have ever heard of?

questions_eng: Would you eat in a restaurant that was really dirty if the food was amazing?

questions_eng: What's the most disgusting thing you've ever heard of happening in a restaurant?

questions_eng: What was your favourite restaurant when you were a kid?

questions_eng: Who are the three greatest athletes of all time?

questions_eng: How much time do you spend watching sports during the week?

questions_eng: Do you play in any fantasy sports leagues? If so, how involved are you in fantasy sports?

questions_eng: Why do you think sports are common in almost all present and past cultures?

questions_eng: Do you play sports video games? Which ones? Is it more fun to play video games or real sports? Why?

questions_eng: Which sport is the most exciting to watch? Which is the most boring to watch?

questions_eng: Is teaching a skill that can be taught?

questions_eng: How has the education you received changed your life?

questions_eng: How can technology improve education? Can it harm it?

questions_eng: What or who has taught you most of the information you use regularly?

questions_eng: What is the most important holiday for your family?

questions_eng: What is your favourite holiday? (Christmas, New Year, Easter, etc.)

questions_eng: Does having a day off for a holiday increase or decrease productivity at work?

questions_eng: If some of the lesser-known holidays were marketed, what would the publicity be like?

questions_eng: If you could have a holiday, what would it be like, what traditions would it have, what would people eat?

questions_eng: Which do you prefer, autumn or spring?

questions_eng: Who was the first band or musician you really liked? Do you still like them?

questions_eng: If you didn't care at all about what people think of you, what clothes would you wear?

questions_eng: Who do you think has the biggest impact on fashion trends: actors and actresses, musicians, fashion designers or consumers?

questions_eng: What is your favourite item of clothing you have/had?

questions_eng: What was the best invention of the past 50 years?

questions_spa: ¿La tecnología simplifica la vida o la hace más complicada?

questions_spa: ¿Salvará la tecnología a la raza humana o la destruirá?

questions_eng: What science fiction book or film would you like the future to be like?

questions_eng: What technology from a science fiction film would you like to have?

questions_eng: What problems will technology solve in the next five years? And what problems will it create?

questions_eng: "What piece of technology would be seen as magic or a miracle to people in medieval Europe?"

questions_eng: "Can you think of any technology that has only made the world worse? How about a technology that has only made the world better?"

questions_eng: What do you think of reality shows, and why do you think they are so popular?

questions_eng: Do you like reality shows, why or why not, and if so, which ones?

questions_spa: ¿Qué canal de TV o de YouTube no existe pero debería existir?
questions_eng: Which TV or YouTube channel doesn't exist but should exist?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es tu anime o dibujo animado favorito de todos los tiempos?
questions_eng: What’s your favorite anime or cartoon of all time?

questions_spa: ¿La piratería está matando o ayudando a la industria del entretenimiento?
questions_eng: Is piracy killing or helping the entertainment industry?

questions_eng: Who're your favourite characters in anime, cartoons or tv?

questions_spa: ¿Qué anime, dibujo animado o serie debería ver a continuación y por qué?
questions_eng: What anime, cartoon or series should I watch next and why?

questions_spa: ¿A dónde te gustaría viajar próximamente?
questions_eng: Where would you like to travel to next?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es el viaje de avión más largo que has hecho?
questions_eng: What is the longest plane journey you have ever taken?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es la mejor manera de viajar? (Avión, automóvil, tren, etc.)
questions_eng: What is the best way to travel? (Plane, car, train, etc.)

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es el lugar más relajante en el que has estado?
questions_eng: Where is the most relaxing place you have ever been?

questions_spa: ¿Prefieres viajar solo o en grupo?
questions_eng: Do you prefer to travel alone or in a group?

questions_spa: ¿Qué piensas de los tours grupales?
questions_eng: What do you think of group tours?

questions_spa: ¿Prefieres salirte del camino establecido cuando viajas?
questions_eng: Do you prefer to go off the beaten track when you travel?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál fue el lugar más sobrevalorado al que has viajado?
questions_eng: What was the most overrated place you have travelled to?

questions_spa: ¿Has viajado a algún país diferente? ¿A cuáles?
questions_eng: Have you travelled to a different country? Which ones?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es el lugar más impresionante en el que has estado?
questions_eng: What is the most impressive place you have been?

questions_spa: ¿Qué es lo mejor de viajar? ¿Qué es lo peor?
questions_eng: What is the best thing about travelling? What is the worst?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es el peor hotel en el que te has alojado? ¿Qué tal el mejor hotel?
questions_eng: What is the worst hotel you have ever stayed in? What is the best hotel?

questions_spa: ¿Cómo crees que viajar a un montón de países diferentes cambia a una persona?
questions_eng: How do you think travelling to a lot of different countries changes a person?

questions_spa: ¿Qué personas interesantes has conocido en tus viajes?
questions_eng: What interesting people have you met on your travels?

questions_spa: ¿Qué piensas de las vacaciones en casa y de visitar solo los sitios turísticos cercanos?
questions_eng: How do you feel about holidaying at home and only visiting nearby tourist sites?

questions_spa: ¿De dónde sacas tus recomendaciones sobre qué hacer y dónde quedarte cuando viajas?
questions_eng: Where do you get your recommendations on what to do and where to stay when you travel?

questions_spa: ¿En dónde y cuándo ocurrió la más asombrosa puesta de sol que hayas visto?
questions_eng: Where and when was the most amazing sunset you have ever seen?

questions_spa: ¿Qué es lo más lejos que has estado de casa?
questions_eng: What's the furthest you've ever been from home?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es el lugar más interesante en el que has estado?
questions_eng: What is the most interesting place you have ever been?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es tu juego favorito de todos los tiempos?
questions_eng: What's your favorite game of all time?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es un juego que creías que te iba a gustar pero que en realidad odiabas?
questions_eng: What's a game you thought you'd like but actually hated?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es un juego muy popular que parece gustar a todo el mundo pero que a ti no te gusta?
questions_eng: What's a really popular game everyone seems to love but you don't like?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es un juego que no esperabas que te gustara pero que acabó gustándote?
questions_eng: What's a game you didn't expect to enjoy but ended up liking?

questions_spa: ¿A qué juego le has dedicado más horas?
questions_eng: What game have you spent the most number of hours on?

questions_spa: Si tuvieras que casarte con el último personaje de videojuego con el que has jugado, ¿quién sería?
questions_eng: If you had to marry the last video game character you played, who would it be?

questions_eng: If you had to live in the world of the last game you played, what world would it be?

questions_eng: Have you ever had a crush on a video game character?

questions_eng: What was the first game you ever remember playing?

questions_eng: Have you ever pretended to be sick to get out of something so you could play a game?

questions_eng: What game did you last complete?

questions_eng: What game do you want to play next?

questions_eng: What's your opinion on Fortnite?

questions_eng: Have you ever watched a Twitch stream?

questions_spa: ¿Te has retransmitido a ti mismo en Twitch o YouTube?
questions_eng: Have you ever streamed yourself on Twitch or YouTube?

questions_eng: Have you ever used a walkthrough?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es la mejor arma que has usado en un juego?
questions_eng: What's the best weapon you've ever used in a game?

questions_eng: Have you ever had to stop playing a game because it was too scary?

questions_eng: Has a game's storyline ever made you cry?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es tu clase de lucha favorita: guerrero, mago o pícaro, y por qué?
questions_eng: What's your favorite fighting class: warrior, mage, or rogue, and why?

questions_eng: What's your favorite game genre?

questions_spa: ¿Prefieres los juegos multijugador o ir en solitario?
questions_eng: Do you prefer multiplayer games or to go solo?

questions_spa: ¿Prefieres el cooperativo o el jugador contra jugador?
questions_eng: Do you prefer co-op or player vs player?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es la primera consola que tuviste?
questions_eng: What is the first console you ever owned?

questions_spa: ¿Qué o quién te hizo entrar en los videojuegos en primer lugar?
questions_eng: What or who got you into video games in the first place?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es la mayor cantidad de tiempo que has estado sentado jugando sin parar?
questions_eng: What is the longest amount of time you have sat playing games non-stop?

questions_spa: Si los videojuegos ya no existieran, ¿qué harías?
questions_eng: If video games didn't exist anymore, what would you do?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es tu canción favorita de un juego?
questions_eng: What is your favorite song from a game?

questions_spa: ¿Alguna vez has querido vivir en un mundo de un juego? Si es así, ¿en cuál y por qué?
questions_eng: Have you ever wanted to live in a world from a game? If so, which one and why?

questions_eng: Which video game character do you most wish you were like?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es el juego en el que te has gastado más dinero?
questions_eng: What's a game you've spent the most amount of money on?

questions_spa: Si pudieras tener un poder de cualquier personaje de videojuego, ¿cuál sería?
questions_eng: If you could have one power of any video game character, who would it be?

questions_spa: ¿A quién sueles elegir como luchador en Super Smash Brothers / Soul Calibur / Street Fighter, etc.?
questions_eng: Who do you usually choose as your fighter in Super Smash Brothers / Soul Calibur / Street Fighter, etc.?

questions_eng: XBOX or PlayStation? Choose one!

questions_eng: Who is your favorite villain from a video game and why?

questions_eng: What is your favorite game from your childhood?

questions_eng: Are there any games you're really bad at?

questions_spa: ¿Has visto alguna vez a alguien enfadarse mucho cuando pierde?
questions_eng: Have you ever seen somebody get really angry when they lose?

questions_spa: ¿Cuál es tu serie de juegos favorita de todos los tiempos?
questions_eng: What's your favorite game series of all time?

questions_spa: ¿Qué es más importante: la acción o la historia?
questions_eng: What's more important: action or story?

questions_eng: Is there a game that is considered to be really bad but is your secret guilty pleasure?

questions_eng: If you could have any video game character as your best friend, who would it be?

questions_eng: If you could marry any game character, who would it be?

questions_spa: ¿Preferirías tener mucho tiempo para jugar pero sólo poder comprar dos juegos al año, o poder comprar muchos juegos pero no tener nunca mucho tiempo para jugarlos?
questions_eng: Would you rather have loads of time to play games but only be able to buy two games a year, or be able to buy loads of games but never have much time to play them?

questions_spa: En tu opinión, ¿cuál es el peor juego de todos los tiempos al que has jugado?
questions_eng: In your opinion, what is the worst game of all time that you've played?

questions_spa: ¿Renunciarías a los videojuegos de por vida y recibirías 500.000 dólares en efectivo, o rechazarías el dinero?
questions_eng: Would you give up video games for life and receive $500,000 in cash, or would you refuse the money?
